document_data.mainbody:
he Baldurs Mouth was a print shop in Baldurs Gate that disseminated news via broadsheets and town criers. It was housed in a narrow, five-story building.
The Baldurs Mouth broadsheet was printed irregularly three to eight times during a tenday, depending on how many articles and advertisers it can come up with for an edition. It was created by Ettvard Needle, the son of a wealthy Lower City tailor.
